scripts.apk:release: rd /s /q android\app\build && rd /s /q android\app\src\main\assets && npm prune --production && npx react-native-clean-project --remove-android-build --remove-npm-lock --remove-yarn-lock --keep-node-modules && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file ./app/index.tsx --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android && gradlew.bat clean && gradlew.bat assembleRelease -x lint && cd .. && adb install -r android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk
scripts.apk:release-main: rd /s /q android\app\build && rd /s /q android\app\src\main\assets && npx react-native start --reset-cache --no-interactive & npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file ./app/index.tsx --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android && gradlew.bat clean && gradlew.bat assembleRelease && cd .. && adb install -r android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk
